mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comments (post_id, user_id, content, created_at) VALUES (#{postId}, #{userId}, #{content}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.select: SELECT c.*, u.username, u.nickname, u.avatar FROM comments c LEFT JOIN users u ON c.user_id = u.id WHERE c.post_id = #{postId} ORDER BY c.created_at DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM comments WHERE post_id = #{postId}
